property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the SatinSetting &#40;a TransparencySetting, StrokeTransparencySetting, FillTransparencySetting or ContentTransparencySetting).

property.name: applied
property.shortdesc: If true, applies the satin effect.

property.name: effectColor
property.shortdesc: The color applied to the satin effect, specified as a swatch &#40;color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink), a color library color, a hex value, or as an array of color values. The color mode dictates the array values: for RGB, specify three values, each in the range 0 to 255, in the format [R,G,B]; for CMYK, specify four values, each as a percentage and each in the range 0 to 100, in the format [C,M,Y,K]; for LAB, specify three values in the format [L,A,B], with L in the range 0 to 100 and A and B in the range -128 to 127; for HSB, specify three colors in the format [H,S,B], with H in the range 0 to 360 and S and B as percentages in the range 0 to 100.

property.name: blendMode
property.shortdesc: The blending mode for the satin effect.

property.name: opacity
property.shortdesc: The opacity of the satin effect &#40;as a percentage). (Range: 0 to 100)

property.name: angle
property.shortdesc: The light angle of the satin effect. &#40;Range: -360 to 360)

property.name: distance
property.shortdesc: The distance &#40;in pixels) from the SatinSetting to the satin effect.

property.name: size
property.shortdesc: The width &#40;in pixels) of the satin effect.

property.name: invertEffect
property.shortdesc: If true, inverts the satin effect.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the SatinSetting.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
